entities.description: Use of sedatives in the past 30 days, 12 months, or longer, whether directed or not directed by a doctor.
Instances where respondents misused sedatives, including using without a prescription or taking them more frequently or for a longer duration than directed.
Status of sedative use with or without a doctor's prescription.
The length of time sedatives have been used, such as past 30 days, past 12 months, or longer.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent used sedatives in various time frames and contexts.
Indicates whether sedative use included misuse, such as using without a prescription or contrary to medical advice.
Specifies if the sedative use was with or without a prescription.
Specifies the time period over which sedatives were used.
